item.title: Mince Pie Challenge: Authentication with Amazon Cognito and JSON Web Tokens
item.description: Now that we have set up the Serverless Framework, we can go about investigating how Authentication and Authorisation will be handled within the application. For this, we will be using Amazon Cognito, a fully managed web service which handles the user sign-up, sign-in and management processes.
